title: 1227 11th St 1 Bedroom Apartment
posting_body: Come right away and see this gorgeous recently remodeled 1bed / 1bath in beautiful Santa Monica just five minutes from the beach and all the very best the city has to offer including the SM pier, 3rd St Promenade, amazing restaurants and shopping and so much more!
- Online Resident Portal: Pay Online, Request Maintenance Service Online, Check your balance any time.
- Credit Score: 600-650, may be approved with conditions; 651+ for no conditions.
- A detailed Rental Policy is available in our application process.
